title: Embedded component of
extract: Embedded components can be divided into two classes: embedded discrete components, that is components that are manufactured as standard discrete components and then placed on an inner layer of the circuit board during fabrication / assembly; and formed embedded components, components that are actually formed on the ...Aug 6, 2018
